ygData.subject: RE: Poison making
ygData.msgSnippet: This was posted on the pottery list.  The recipe for vials!!! OK, since people who announce they know something but are not telling annoy me, I will send out
ygData.messageBody:
This was posted on the pottery list. The recipe for vials!!!

OK, since people who announce they know something but are not telling annoy
me, I will send out the formula for everyone. I made multiple vials and
will
list
my skill levels below:

Vial

Small Block of Clay
Any non-ruined pelt - I have succeeded with Black Wolf Skin,
Puma Skin, Grizzley Skin, Low Qual Bear Pelt,
Med Qual Cat Pelt, High Qual Cat Pelt
Vial Sketch
High Quality Firing Sheet

Lined Vial

Small Block of Clay
Any non-ruined pelt
Lined Vial sketch
High Quality Firing Sheet (?)


With a skill of 120, I was successful on making 6 of 7 vial attempts.
My rate with lined vial attempts was 0 of 9, although I was received
the "Lack Skill" message and not the "Does not Combine" message.

Hope this helps.


-----Original Message-----
From: Kenneth Toomey [mailto:kennydt@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 3:22 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Poison making


From: Kenneth Toomey <kennydt@...>







---Sean Bundy <sbundy@...> wrote:
>
> One problem.
>
> All of the poisons require vials. The vials are
made by persons skilled in the art of pottery.
Verant has seen fit NOT TO TELL ANYONE HOW TO MAKE
THE FRICKING THINGS! They said the vials were to be
the item potters could sell in their 'player based'
economy. So far ive seen numerous posts by people
trying every different combination to make the stupid
vials, and nobody has it yet. So rejoice, poison is
fixed! Good luck finding vials though.
>
> Sean
> Ninolin (Bristlebain)
>

why the hell does Verant do everything half assed?
Add a new item to make.... but don't update the
pottery book to tell you how to do it. Stupid.

I dunno why me email displays that. I use
Rocketmail... mst have something to do with them so
don't ask. i can do nothing about it.
-Kenny
